title.native: NARUTOナルトSD ロック・リーの青春フルパワー忍伝
title.romaji: NARUTO SD Rock Lee no Seishun Full-Power Ninden
title.english: NARUTO Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals

description:
Welcome to the Hidden Leaf Village. The village where Uzumaki Naruto, star of the TV show "Naruto" makes his home. Every day, countless powerful ninjas carry out missions and train to hone their skills. Our main character is one of these powerful ninjas...but it's not Naruto! It's the ninja who can't use ninjutsu, Rock Lee! In spite of his handicap, Lee has big dreams. He works hard every day to perfect his hand-to-hand combat skills and become a splendid ninja! And to achieve his dream, he puts in more effort than anyone else. Under the hot-blooded tutelage of his teacher Guy, he works alongside his teammates Tenten and Neji. Watch the Beautiful Green Beast Rock Lee train, go on missions, and have all sorts of adventures!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Naruto SD-Rock Lee:Les Péripéties d'un ninja en herbe

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yasunoriebina)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dajinman)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tomoyuki.kurokawa.7)__

__Tomoyuki Kurokawa__ is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist. He was affiliated with studio Bee Train.

He made his lead directorial debut with the OVA _[Murder Princess](https://anilist.co/anime/1696/Murder-Princess/)_, and had his first lead director role with the release of _[Psychic Detective Yakumo](https://anilist.co/anime/7662/Shinrei-Tantei-Yakumo/)_.

[Website](http://maeyamada.com/) | [Website 2](http://hyadain.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HyadainMaeyamad)

Maeyamada graduated in 2007 from Kyoto University and started his musical career immediately afterwards.

Maeyamada graduated in 2007 from Kyoto University and started his musical career immediately afterwards.
Known for his involvement in the [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/1735/) franchise.
Kenji Taira (平建史, Taira Kenji) is a Japanese mangaka and Masashi Kishimoto's assistant.

Secret (Korean: 시크릿; Japanese: シークレット, often stylized as SECRET) is a South Korean K-pop girl group formed by TS Entertainment in 2009. Consisting of four members—Jeon Hyosung, Jung Hana, Song Jieun and Han Sunhwa—the group released their third Japanese single and first Japanese digital single, "Twinkle Twinkle". The tittle track was used as ending theme song for the anime Rock Lee no Seishun Full-Power Ninden.

Twitter __Yukio Nishimoto__ is a Japanese director, animation director, episode director and storyboard artist.
Occasional animator.
__Rokou Ogiwara__ is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

Formerly affiliated with [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/) and [Ordet](https://anilist.co/studio/334/). He was one of the people to follow [Yutaka Yamamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/101655/) to Ordet after its establishment. After leaving Kyoto Animation he primarily used the pen name Gorou Sessha and became well known for his work in the [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/20/) franchise. His directorial debut was [Naruto: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals](https://anilist.co/anime/12979/) which he directed from episode 27 onwards under the supervision of [Masahiko Murata](https://anilist.co/staff/102608/).
